title: Bulgaria Average Monthly Wages
description: Wages in Bulgaria increased to 1787 BGN/Month in September from 1693 BGN/Month in August of 2022. Wages in Bulgaria averaged 667.03 BGN/Month from 1997 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1787 BGN/Month in September of 2022 and a record low of 30 BGN/Month in January of 1997. In Bulgaria, wages are benchmarked using average monthly earnings. This page provides - Bulgaria Average Monthly Wages - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Statistical Institute, Bulgaria
